actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to strengthen the penalties for violation of the Great Lakes Pilotage Act of 1960.

summary.text: Revises the penalties for violation of the Great Lakes Pilotage Act of 1960 by imposing a fine of $5,000 and/or imprisonment for not more than one-year. Authorizes the seizure of a vessel for a violation of the Act.

titles.title: A bill to strengthen the penalties for violation of the Great Lakes Pilotage Act of 1960.
